runtime/component/durion-chat/
	entity/
		DurChatSession.xml        # chat sessions, linked to user/party
		DurChatMessage.xml        # individual chat messages and metadata
	service/
		DurChatServices.xml       # chat orchestration + calls to backend MCP server
	script/
		groovy/
			DurChatServices.groovy  # Groovy implementations for chat + MCP integration
	screen/
		durion/
			chat/
				ChatMain.xml          # main chat UI container
				ChatSessionFind.xml   # list/search existing chat sessions
				ChatSessionView.xml   # view of a single conversation
	data/
		DurChatDemoData.xml       # optional demo chat sessions/messages

Notes:
	- The DurChatServices layer will be responsible for calling the
		pos-mcp-server backend (e.g., /api/mcp/chat) to execute MCP
		tools and agentic workflows on behalf of the user.
	- The UI screens should remain thin, delegating all back-end
		logic and tool selection to DurChatServices so that front-end
		changes do not impact MCP integration details.
